title: Area Volume: region bound by 2 functions of x part - a

content.description: Let R be the shaded region in the first quadrant enclosed by the y-axis and the graphs of y = 1 - x3 and y = sin(x2), as shown in the figure above.
content.question: Find area of R.

topic.text: 8.4: Finding the Area Between Curves Expressed as Functions of x

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Use appropriate mathematical symbols and notation (e.g., Represent a derivative using Æ’'(x), y', and dy/dx).
